project.name: C-C761A-PSQL-08-ST01-DT03-DF13-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C761A-PSQL-08-ST01-DT03-DF13-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Malloc a buffer. Copy the input string to the buffer. Search for 'e' in the string. Upon finding 'e', free the buffer, using a pointer that points to that 'e'. If 'e' is the first character in the buffer, everything is OK. However, if e is not the first character in the buffer, this will seg fault.

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C761A-PSQL-08-ST01-DT03-DF13-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Malloc a buffer. Copy the input string to the buffer. Search for 'e' in the string. Upon finding 'e', free the buffer, using a pointer that points to that 'e'. If 'e' is the first character in the buffer, everything is OK. However, if e is not the first character in the buffer, this will seg fault.

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
